import React , {useState} from 'react' import { UseSelector } from 'react-redux' import Product from './Product' const Cart = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const handleButton = () =>{ const initialnum = 0; const[mynum , updatedmynum] = useState(initialnum); return ( <>

{mynum}

updatedmynum(mynum + 1)}> INCR
( mynum > 0 ? updatedmynum(mynum-1) : updatedmynum(0))}> DECR
) } return ( <>

{Product.title}

{Product.qty} X ${Product.price} = ${Product.qty * Product.price}

) } export default Cart
